name: Romanian Air Traffic Services Administration
membership: GateOne, CANSO, DANUBE FAB, SESAR DEPLOYMENT MANAGER as Implementing Partner
goal: ROMATSA`s main activity is the provision of air navigation services, including air traffic services, comunication, navigation and surveillance services, aeronautical information services and aeronautical maps, meteorological services.  SAR Coordonation Center is located at ROMATSA Headquarters- Bucharest.
interests: Environment, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: - implementation of the Single European Sky legislation and EASA applicable requirements for ATM/ANS
